audioText: Cet architecte renommé a habité cette magnifique demeure victorienne pendant vingt-cinq années consécutives avant de la léguer à ses descendants.
question: What did the renowned architect do with the Victorian mansion?
options: Lived in it for twenty-five consecutive years before bequeathing it to descendants
Renovated it completely and sold it to wealthy investors
Transformed it into a prestigious cultural center for the community
Demolished it to build a modern architectural masterpiece
explanation: The text states 'Cet architecte renommé a habité cette magnifique demeure victorienne pendant vingt-cinq années consécutives avant de la léguer à ses descendants' - This renowned architect lived in this magnificent Victorian mansion for twenty-five consecutive years before bequeathing it to his descendants. 'Habité' is the past participle of 'habiter' (to live/reside).
